mapper.sql: id, logistics_no, logistics_msg, logistics_detail_hash, create_time, modify_time
mapper.select: select sol.shop_order_no,sol.logistics_no,sol.logistics_name,sol.logistics_hash,sol.logistics_hash,sold.logistics_detail_hash from shop_order_logistics sol,shop_order_logistics_detail sold where sol.logistics_no=sold.logistics_no and sol.logistics_no=#{logisticsNo}
mapper.insert:
insert into shop_order_logistics_detail
id,
logistics_no,
logistics_msg,
logistics_detail_hash,
create_time,
modify_time,

mapper.update:
update shop_order_logistics_detail
logistics_no = #{logisticsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logistics_msg = #{logisticsMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logistics_detail_hash = #{logisticsDetailHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update shop_order_logistics_detail set logistics_no = #{logisticsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logistics_msg = #{logisticsMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logistics_detail_hash = #{logisticsDetailHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sol.logistics_no from shop_order_logistics sol where sol.shop_order_no=#{orderNo} limit 1
